item.title: Home Default Old
item.dc:creator: drfurion
item.content:encoded:
New ArrivalBasic Colours Comeback

Less is more never out of date. In the last of this years, basic colours will comeback, discover our collections and choose your style

Shop nowView
Lookbooktrending itemsCrossbody Belt Bags

Product by 100% polyurethane. & 100% polyester, All crossbody belt bags bring the usefuls and suit for your any style

Start From$59.00Discount 50% SunglassesClip-on LensOver 50 items sunglasses ready for discount,
available in-stock, Grab it now!Shop now 1PrevNext

About Durotan

Established in 1991, Durotan & Logan Cee, 2 fashion artists work together in UK, start from design the casual for people around their location.

item.content:encoded:
New ArrivalBasic Colours Comeback

Less is more never out of date. In the last of this years, basic colours will comeback, discover our collections and choose your style

Shop nowView
Lookbooktrending itemsCrossbody Belt Bags

Product by 100% polyurethane. & 100% polyester, All crossbody belt bags bring the usefuls and suit for your any style

Start From$59.00Discount 50% SunglassesClip-on LensOver 50 items sunglasses ready for discount,
available in-stock, Grab it now!Shop now 1PrevNext

About Durotan

Established in 1991, Durotan & Logan Cee, 2 fashion artists work together in UK, start from design the casual for people around their location.
The inspiration got from natural, color pastel & activities the daily. Durotan’s items alway look very basic but never out trend, easy to mixed with any

item.title: About Us
item.dc:creator: drfurion
item.content:encoded:
Durotan’s Story

Established in 1991, Durotan & Logan Cee, 2 fashion artists work together in UK,
The inspiration got from natural, color pastel & activities the daily. Durotan’s items alway look
very basic but never out trend, easy to mixed with anystyle.
Quality materials
Gurantee 100% polyurethane and 100% polyester
Free shipping
We free shipping for all oders over $199
Secure payment
Guarante 100% secure payment online on our website

The Company

With a strong sense of community and a moral responsibility,
our brand was born. Our passion for the environment and unique
design brought our vision, and products, to life.

Each product is infused with the elements of aroma, memory, place and beauty traditions from across the globe. These “artifacts” carry with them stories and maps of their discoveries. Always striving to inspire and to be inspired.

est. 1991

The leader

What that starts with, then, is a design which meets the needs not only of today and tomorrow, but the tomorrow after tomorrow, too, and of any number of tomorrows after that. It is a design which has designs to be, above all, pleasing to wear and satisfying to use, and, all the while, to go about its business in a way best described as unassuming.

Absolutely no hassle. No matter what you spill on it - coffee, oil, cranberry juice, nail polish, you can easily wipe it clean with just soap and water.

From Durotan with Love,

Logan cee

Stores list

New York

STORE 1

68 Atlantic Ave St, Brooklyn, NY 90002, USA
(+005) 5896 72 78 79
hellony@durotan.com.us

STORE 2

172 Richmond Hill Ave St, Stamford, NY 90002, USA
(+005) 5896 03 04 05

London

88 Landsome Way St, Stockwell, London 534, UK
(+089) 5896 26 26 27
hellold@durotan.com.uk

Berlin

205 Luckstrabe St, Rummelburg, Berlin 77502, Germany
(+0668) 5896 45 45 46
helloge@durotan.com.us

our partners

item.title: Legendary Whitetails Men’s
item.dc:creator: drfurion
item.content:encoded:
Introduce

Tailored line. Wool mix fabric. Long design. Long buttoned sleeve. Lapel with notch. Back slit. Two pockets with flaps on the front. Button up. Inner lining. Inner pocket. Back length 95.0 cm.
INSPIRATION
Blue silk tuxedo with marbled aquatic pattern and dark lining. Sleeves are complete with rounded hem and black buttons.

Material & Washing Instructions

Composition: 51% wool,45% polyester,2% acrylic,2% viscose. Lining: 53% cotton,47% polyester. Sleeve lining: 100% polyester
  • No Washing
  • do not bleach
  • ironing max 110 0 c / 230 0 f
  • dry cleaning perchloroethylene
  • do not tumble dry

item.title: Retro Whitetails 100% Suede Men’s Sneaker
item.dc:creator: drfurion
item.content:encoded:
Introduce

Tailored line. Wool mix fabric. Long design. Long buttoned sleeve. Lapel with notch. Back slit. Two pockets with flaps on the front. Button up. Inner lining. Inner pocket. Back length 95.0 cm.

Material & Washing Instructions

Composition: 51% wool,45% polyester,2% acrylic,2% viscose. Lining: 53% cotton,47% polyester. Sleeve lining: 100% polyester
  • No Washing
  • do not bleach
  • ironing max 110 0 c / 230 0 f
  • dry cleaning perchloroethylene
  • do not tumble dry

item.title: MD Sunglass 41.5mm
item.dc:creator: drfurion
item.content:encoded:
Introduce

Tailored line. Wool mix fabric. Long design. Long buttoned sleeve. Lapel with notch. Back slit. Two pockets with flaps on the front. Button up. Inner lining. Inner pocket. Back length 95.0 cm.
INSPIRATION
Blue silk tuxedo with marbled aquatic pattern and dark lining. Sleeves are complete with rounded hem and black buttons.

Material & Washing Instructions

Composition: 51% wool,45% polyester,2% acrylic,2% viscose. Lining: 53% cotton,47% polyester. Sleeve lining: 100% polyester
  • No Washing
  • do not bleach
  • ironing max 110 0 c / 230 0 f
  • dry cleaning perchloroethylene
  • do not tumble dry
